title: ExpoSURE
description: Exposure is an online photography event where participants submit original photographs based on specified themes. Photographs will be judged based on public likes and a panel of judges. The event includes themes like 'Street Symphony,' 'Dancing in the Rain,' 'Doors to Imagination,' and 'Nature’s Companions.' Participants can use a DSLR or mobile phone for submissions.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
The team-head should register for the event, on behalf of the team.
rules: Photographs must be submitted via the registration form before 15.02.25.
Photographs must align with one of the following themes: 'Street Symphony,' 'Dancing in the Rain,' 'Doors to Imagination,' or 'Nature’s Companions.'
The photograph must be original and not sourced from the internet or plagiarized.
No watermarks are allowed on the photo.
DSLR and mobile phones are permitted for photography.
Selfies and casual photos will not be accepted.
Basic editing, such as color correction and cropping, is acceptable.
The photograph will be evaluated based on the number of likes (50%) and the judges' decision (50%).
